text: wow that is pretty cool thanks <@UEKMY50SU> <https://app.HubSpot.com/design-manager/9131194/file/39924881089>

do note that I removed the use of process.env as I could not get it to work. I used an alternative method instead. I also did a development build to preserve process.env to test whether that would work. It unfortunately did not.

i see you only have the secrets configured for one endpoint. was this intentional? you could make `secrets` a top-level property in the `serverless.json` file if you want them to be configured for all endpoints
thanks for info, just for purpose of showing you I included the secrets there.
